description: Hiruma Yoichi, usually referred to as Hiruma, is a protagonist and major driving force of the plot of Eyeshield 21. At the beginning of the series, he witnesses Sena Kobayakawa`s running abilities and forces the boy to join the team as the ace running back, and hides his identity during games by having him use the codename "Eyeshield 21". He captains and plays quarterback for the series` protagonist team, the Deimon Devil Bats, but also serves the duties of a coach, as the team lacks one.
name: Hiruma Yoichi
